snippet.title: Forgotten But Unbroken Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Forgotten But Unbroken is an immersive WW2 strategy game where you lead the resistance against Axis forces. It’s coming later this year, and there’s a demo available on Steam.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #forgottenbutunbroken
